title: My Account Level is Too Low to Post a Discussion in Gameplay
body: Hello, I wanted to start a discussion in general after having played this game for a little over a year, but alas! The boards tell me that my account is too low of a level! I'm relatively sure they're talking about the in-game leveling system (correct me if I'm wrong). If so my account should be level 30. Why can't I post a discussion? Thanks!

replies.body:
This appears a common occurrence from what I've seen. Pardon for necro'ing the thread, but I thought it might be better to at least test-post on the relevant discussion. 

(Glad you got it working!)
You were right! This boards level is linked with your Summoner level, it looks like it just wasn't updating correctly. Posting here did the trick though ^_^
